name: php.net (beta site - responsive css)
description: this style applies the site php.net correctly if you are using the new beta design. and there only if the browser inner-width is smaller then 976 pixels. in this case it reduces some elements to get a better view on the current article. in detail the header, menu, uvTab ( feedback & ideas ) & footer will be shrinked to a minimum. if you hover any of these shrinked elements they will appear. example page used in screenshots.
